bug.author: qianwangn
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h5>System information (version)</denchmark-h>
Icant find POT in your docs. docs said I cant compile pot in deployment_tools. but where is depleyment_tools?

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/qianwangn>@qianwangn</denchmark-link> , POT tool is being developed in a private repository but it is available in the Intel distribution of the <denchmark-link:https://docs.openvinotoolkit.org/latest/installation_guides.html>OpenVINO toolkit</denchmark-link> . Once you install it you can find POT under <openvino_install_dir>/deployment_tools/tools/post_training_optimization_toolkit/. All the documentation is available <denchmark-link:https://docs.openvinotoolkit.org/latest/pot_README.html>online</denchmark-link> .
